The Third Angel's Message. 

     The third angel is represented as following the first and second angels, and crying with a loud voice, "If any man worship the beast and his image, and receive his mark in his forehead, or in his hand, the same shall drink of the wine of the wrath of God, which is poured out without mixture into the cup of his indignation . . . . 


                     -23- 

Here is the patience of the saints: here are they that keep the commandments of God, and the faith of Jesus."
